review: Bad Rats rip-off. Not even a good one.
If you like this game, you will love Bad Rats!
I've never felt so close to Christ.

Summary: 'Oh the Dragon's balls were blazing as I stepped into his cave and I sliced his ♥♥♥♥ing cockles with a long and shiney blade. 'Twas I who ♥♥♥♥ed the Dragon. Sing a lie, sing '♥♥♥♥aloo', and if you try to ♥♥♥♥ with me then I shall ♥♥♥♥ you too!'
